A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: One word: disappointed. I hyped myself up so much for it\, and was let down. I feel as though Disney took the Marvel Cinematic Universe route and added too much levity. I was looking for so much\, after having followed it up to this point\, and found so little. Definitely awestruck moments\, but definitely not the way I foresaw it happening. I have not read any of the bad press yet\, but I am sure I concur with much of it.
